ComicInfo.Summary:
Spinning out of the hit Netflix original show comes a new four-issue miniseries further detailing the intrigue and danger of the international drug trade of the 1990s! Two new recruits bring danger to DEA agents Murphy and Pe√±a, while El Patron must contend with a dangerous threat to his drug empire!
